#summary Declaration of interface properties.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Interface property declaration =
The syntax to declare a property in an interface is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
interface-property-declaration:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> type identifier { interface-accessors }
interface-accessors:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>get</tt> ;<br/>
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>set</tt> ;<br/>
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>get</tt> ; annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>set</tt> ;<br/>
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>set</tt> ; annotations<sub>opt</sub> <tt>get</tt> ;
</em></blockquote>
The specified accessors are implicitly {{{public}}} and {{{abstract}}}.
